about_the_game:
"Will the Storm Ever Stop?": Enter the Unknown Memoirs of 'Stormy Night




"Unknown Memoirs is an episodic psychological horror game"

"Stormy Night" takes the player through a horrifying journey where a Never Ending Storm brings with it paranormal events.

This is a short story horror game experience



News breaks that there have been strange sightings as The Storm enters its third week. The player, stuck in their apartment, tries to go about live as usual, but is quickly swept into a horrific spiral that The Storm seems to have brought with it.



Players will have to brave The Storm and find a way to survive as everything around them starts to fall apart. Will you be able to survive The Storm?, or rather what was brought along with it...

Game Features

  • The main genre of the game is "Walking simulator";
  • Gameplay is close to realism;
  • The game uses a unique 4:3 aspect ratio, mimicking the feeling of "found footage";
  • Physics objects have been incorporated into the game that the player can interact with;

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains intense psychological horror elements that may be unsettling for some players. The game features depictions of blood. Players will encounter terrifying monsters and disturbing imagery The game is not intended for children or those who are sensitive to horror and mature themes.

short_description: "Unknown Memoirs" is a short horror game series focusing on distressing tales of horror. "Stormy Night" sets the player in a world where an unnatural storm has been going on for days. As the player explores the world around them, things start to take a turn towards the unnatural.
